source(knitr::purl('pages/setup.Rmd', output = tempfile()))

## DAG

The following DAG illustrates the casual relationships assumed to be true for 
the purposes of the study.

- C: Culture
- W: Warnings
- R: Refactoring
- D: Defects
- S: Size

```{r dag, message=FALSE}
library(dagitty)

dag <- dagitty("dag {
    C -> R
    W -> R
    D -> R
    D -> W
    S -> D
}")

tidy_dagitty(dag, layout="fr") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y, xend=xend, yend=yend)) +
  geom_dag_node() +
  geom_dag_text() +
  geom_dag_edges() +
  theme_dag()
```
